attributes.action: Reduce overseas funding to help fund our NHS crisis and help our own country
attributes.additional_details: Reduce funding to other countries and actually help our own
attributes.background: The NHS is a shambles taking 22 hours or more to be even seen. No ambulances, patients waiting in ambulances for hours or in corridors. We pay for this service and used to be proud of our NHS but no longer have any faith. We need to get this back

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop all overseas spending including foreign aid
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/740913
